description:
HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Ulimp defence is a game where you can turn yourself into a god defending treasures!
In this game we combined simple tower defence mechanic with mythical creatures and magical towers shooting thunderbolts.
the key to success is correct positioning and risk management. Smooth animations and nice graphics will keep you thrilled and make your free time even more enjoyable!
Will you be the one to defeat the ancient spirits? Try out now!

WebComics™ is the ultimate destination for Comic & Manhwa fans worldwide, offering the latest and hottest authentic comic series. Whether you're a fan of Manga, Manhwa, or Webtoon, we provide exhilarating and high-definition comic reads of numerous genres, including Romance, Action, Fantasy, Comedy, BL, GL, Drama, Horror, and more. If you fancy billionaires, destined partners, dominant CEOs, vampires, love triangles, otherworldly adventures, time-travel, enemies-to-lovers, or contractual marriage, it's your go-to platform for reading the best stories. Come and enjoy reading webtoons on www.webcomicsapp.com.
 
Why Choose WebComics™
1. A World of Infinite Comic & Manga Excitement
WebComics™ presents top-notch and exclusive comics, manga & manhwa from acclaimed creators across the globe. Our all-covered genres cater to your every interest and preference!
2. Unparalleled Experience in Reading Exclusive Comics & Manhwa
WebComics™ offers a plethora of exclusive original manhwa, manga & webtoons featuring distinctive and innovative storytelling, unparalleled creativity, and a reading experience that stands out as top-tier.
3. Daily Free Reading Privileges
Indulge in daily free reading perks on WebComics™, catering to fans of Romance, Action, Fantasy, or LGBTQ genres. Come back each day for our newest free manhwa, webtoon & manga giveaway events!
4. Tailored Recommendations Just for You
We push personalized and captivating manhwa & manga suggestions that perfectly align with your interests.
5. Free Downloads and Offline Reading Convenience
No Internet? Download your preferred stories at no cost and enjoy them offline, ideal for travel or time killing.

WebComics™ features over 5 million reads of webtoon, manga and manhwa on numerous genres, allowing you to access these manga & manhua without the need to purchase physical copies!
 
Top-ranking Author Team
Join our diverse community of WebComics authors from around the globe! Our talented webtoon & comic creators produce captivating content daily. Don't miss out on the opportunity to be a part of our brilliant team!
Send us your work right now! Email: comiceditor@webcomicsapp.com

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:
• The automatic renewal terms stated above.
• The New York Times Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/privacy-policy
• The New York Times Cookie Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/cookie-policy
• The New York Times California Privacy Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice
• The New York Times Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html

* Promotional offers for new subscribers only. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Download the app today and subscribe to receive instant access to WSJ’s unrivaled journalism covering today’s top stories across finance, politics, business, tech, the economy and more. Enjoy exclusive newsletters and videos that dive deeper into the stories that matter.

Key benefits include:

Customizable App Experience 
(+) Follow your your favorite WSJ journalists
(+) Access interactive charts to follow the latest market trends
(+) Create personalized stock watch lists 
(+) Get content relevant to your job title and industry

Award-winning Journalism Delivered To Your Mobile Device
(+) A real-time news feed, curated by WSJ’s award-winning journalists throughout the day
(+) Up to date global coverage on the news that matters 
(+) Access to curated CFO, CIO, and CMO article feeds

Full Access to WSJ, Anywhere, Anytime
(+) Full access to WSJ on any device
(+) Ability to listen to WSJ articles on your commute, hands-free
(+) Offline reading, enabling you to remain informed, wherever you are

Real Time Market News - Never Miss a Critical Development
(+) Up to the minute stock market quotes
(+) Alerts and notifications for breaking news and updates on the stories, companies and industries that matter most to you
(+) Articles relevant to your personalized stock list

The WSJ App provides comprehensive access that will help you better understand and navigate the complexities of today’s financial world. Regardless of your investing experience, download the app to make more sound financial decisions. 

Stay ahead, stay informed – with The Wall Street Journal App.


Your subscription will renew automatically each month and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Read the novel and comic version of the hottest anime – Solo Leveling (Only I Level Up)! 

Introducing the all-new WebNovel – your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures. 

Discover a treasure trove of novel genres that will transport you to realms beyond your imagination. The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all—we've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel – where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

Featured genres: Mystery, Eastern Fantasy, Western Fantasy, Sci-fi, Fan-fic, Xianxia, Xuanhuan, Wuxia, Romance, Adventure Mangas, Comics, Manhua, Webtoon

Original and Exclusive Novels: Supreme Magus, My Vampire System. Shadow Slave

Translated and exclusive novels: Library of Heaven's Path, Lord of the Mysteries, She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment

Exclusive Comic/Manga/Manhua/Manhwa/Webtoon: Beauty and the Beast, When Beauty meets Beasts

Interested in writing or having a story that you seek to share? Start now by joining thousands of aspiring authors through sharing your stories on WebNovel. “The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” Join our various contests and publish your novel with our matchmaking system to millions of readers who share a similar interest in your genre. Find your voice and share your message with the world.

Multiple book genres await you to explore on WebNovel, from epic fantasies to hundreds of thousands of unique fanfictions. 

Anyone can find novels/comics/manga/manhua/fanfics/webtoons that they are interested in on WebNovel. Try it out now without any further delay!

FlipHTML5 is your go-to digital publishing platform to create, enhance and distribute your stories to the world. Enjoy millions of magazines, newspapers, ebooks, storybooks, comics, brochures, catalogs and more free publications on your phone/tablet. The only digital newsstand you'll ever need. Upload files from your device and instantly convert to digital flipbooks. Craft your story anytime, anywhere.

Download the FlipHTML5 app to open up a whole new world of magazine reading, over 5 million of digital publications in 200+ languages!

Key Features
• Digital Newsstand: Explore the best content in Tech & Science, Food & Home, News & Business, Art & Photography, Lifestyle & Hobbies, Fashion & Entertainment, search in categories, find your favorite, and save to your reading list.

• Follow & Share: Follow your favorite publishers, check out their profiles for more, and get notifications for new issues. Just like you share your favorite books, you can share the publisher’s profile with your friends too.

• Flipbook Creation: Import the file from your mobile device and convert a digital flipbook. Supported formats include PDF, Word, PPT, PNG, and JPG images. From creation to distribution, tell your story from the convenience of your phone.

• Book Management: Login to your FlipHTML5 account to view all your books and sort them by name, time, and status. Keep your books public, private or password protected.

Our goal is to make content creation easy for you as a creator and reading a joy for you as a reader. Download the FlipHTML5 mobile app to start your content journey now!

Terms of Use: https://fliphtml5.com/terms-of-service.php
Privacy Policy: https://fliphtml5.com/privacy-policy.php

Nerdish is a self-education app for adults who aim to learn and know more about the world. Read concise and engaging articles with insights on topics related to science, history, arts, society, technology, famous people, food, daily things and other fields of general knowledge. Nerdish helps you learn something new every day with quick 5–10 minute reads.

Nerdish offers:
- Short, science-based, and inspiring learning articles across categories like Art and Culture, History, Science, Technology, Psychology, Health, Politics, and Society.
- All content is designed for self-education on the go — brief, fact-checked, well-structured, and perfect for curious minds who love learning.
- Get maximum knowledge in minimum time with quick daily reads that make education simple, engaging, and fun.

The articles featured in Nerdish are short, science-based, and easy to read — yet far from being just collections of random facts.
Each topic delivers essential knowledge in a clear, structured way, helping you learn the basics of science, history, art, and more in just minutes.
Key ideas across different articles are logically connected, creating a deeper understanding of the world and helping knowledge stick.
Nerdish makes self-education simple and inspiring — combining learning, discovery, and personal growth in every read.

Nerdish is a perfect match for those who:
- Love learning and discovering new facts every day.
- Enjoy reading short, engaging, and educational articles.
- Are curious about the world and excited to expand their general knowledge.
- Love nonfiction books and smart, inspiring reads.
- Enjoy finding new ideas and connections between things they already know.

Nerdish is a new way to approach lifelong learning and self-development.
The world around us is constantly changing, and expanding your knowledge helps you stay inspired, think creatively, and adapt with ease. At work, on a date, or at a party — it always feels good to be the one who knows a bit more. With Nerdish, you can keep learning every day and become that curious, confident, and well-informed person everyone loves to talk to.

Learn with us about: 
- History and civilization: ancient empires, great discoveries, revolutions, and remarkable people who changed the world.
- Science and nature: the human body, space, evolution, physics, and everyday phenomena explained simply.
- Art and culture: painting, music, architecture, design, literature, and creative movements.
- Psychology and society: emotions, thinking, habits, communication, and social change.
- Technology and innovation: AI, inventions, space exploration, and the tools that shape modern life.
- Daily life and fun facts: why the sky is blue, how coffee was discovered, or where common ideas come from.

Nerdish is making popular science more popular.

iToim апп танд Монгол Улс болон дэлхий дахинд өрнөж буй гол үйл явдлуудын учир шалтгаан, чухал мэдээллүүдээс хоцрохгүй байх боломжийг олгоно. iToim-ын мэргэжлийн редакц зөвхөн найдвартай, анхдагч эх сурвалжаас мэдээллийг баталгаажуулдаг. Улс төр, эдийн засаг, технологи, нийгмийн сэдвүүдээс гадна нийтлэлчдийн анализ, тусгай сурвалжлагуудыг iToim+ танд хүргэх болно.

Burlesque Bible is the only magazine that celebrates the international Burlesque scene, receiving great praise from industry professionals and enthusiastic novices keen to learn more. Every issue you'll find interviews with current Burlesque artists and celebrations of stars of the past, topical features uncovering all aspects of the British and international Burlesque scene, plus practical advise and information for developing and expanding your own Burlesque act.

This is a free app download with paid content within. The current issue, back issues and future issues can be purchased within the app. 

Subscriptions are also available within the application. When a recurring subscription is purchased the latest issue will become available to download immediately. 

Available subscriptions are:

Bundles of single issues can be also be bought within the application. To use purchased credits, simply click on the issue price and select ‘use credit’. This allows you to purchase back issues at reduced prices.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved. 
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update please click the settings cog, then click Settings then Refresh app data. If this also fails to work please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Everything you love about Vogue - anytime, anywhere. Get the news, shop the latest trends, and connect with fellow fashion obsessives from around the world with the Vogue app.

On the Vogue app, you can:
- Get the inside line on the top stories from Vogue editors.
- Engage with fellow fashion enthusiasts in discussions on your favorite topics.
- Shop editor-approved buys and the latest trends all within the app.
- Test your runway IQ with our daily Runway Genius quiz.
- Discover new topics to join the conversation across the globe.
- Never miss a story by following Vogue editors and contributors and exploring their latest posts.
- Take a front row seat at every international show.
- Explore our archive of 20,000+ fashion shows by designer, season, location and type
- Browse 1 million+ runway images— dating back to 1988—with AI-powered image search.
- Vote on your favorite looks, then see how your selects stack up to the Vogue community.
- Save looks and collections to your mood boards, with advanced organizational tools.
- Get a close-up look at all the details from Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and so much more.
- Follow your favorite brands and topics so you never miss a Vogue moment.
- Share your favorite looks and collections with others via email, text, and social media.
- Browse thousands of photos capturing street style worldwide, shot by our renowned photographers.
- Read reviews from Vogue’s internationally recognized writers for our insider take.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited digital access to Vogue Runway. Users need to be logged in and subscribed to access Vogue Runway content. All Vogue subscribers will have unlimited digital access to the app as part of their existing subscription. App subscribers have full access to the Web site. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail appfeedback@vogue.com for assistance.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Explore the Past Like Never Before – Your Ultimate History Companion!

Step into the world of history with the most immersive and interactive history app available! Whether you’re a student, a trivia enthusiast, or just someone who loves the past, our app is designed to make learning history fun, engaging, and deeply informative. From ancient wonders to modern revolutions, this history encyclopedia has it all! Download now and start your journey through time.

Explore history every day with expertly curated insights, deep dives, and timeless knowledge. This history app offers a rich collection of history facts, biographies, and cultural insights, bringing the past to life through engaging storytelling and in-depth analysis.

Daily History & Encyclopedia-Style Learning
• Discover daily history updates, daily facts, today in history and daily random facts about pivotal events, legendary figures, and forgotten stories
• Browse a vast encyclopedia of history, culture, and philosophy, drawing inspiration from Wikipedia, history channel and other apps
• Explore timelines of civilizations, from the ancient world to the medieval era and beyond
• Gain insights from great thinkers like Socrates, Plato, and the Stoics, shaping your understanding of history and thought
• Discover the influence of art history, literature, and philosophy on human civilization

Exclusive History Content & Audio Vault
• Dive into detailed world history lessons covering ancient civilizations, medieval times, and modern events
• Explore art history, famous leaders, groundbreaking inventions, and pivotal wars
• Access a vast encyclopedia of historical knowledge, similar to Wiki, with expertly curated articles
• Listen to history podcasts and curated content similar to history hit and other apps
• Read compelling history stories from around the world, covering everything from Napoleon’s rise to the journeys of Marco Polo

Learn History & National Geographic with AI-Powered Exploration
• Expand your vocabulary and knowledge with learn words and historical terminology explanations
• Connect history with geography by tracing the movements of civilizations, explorers, and empires, paladin and more
• Ask our History AI any question and get instant, well-researched answers
• Chat with historical figures and experience interactive storytelling
• Get personalized recommendations based on your interests, just like a history vault of knowledge!

History Quiz Weekly Series - Test Your Knowledge Every Week
• Every week features 4 themed categories with 10 fresh, curated questions each
• Categories span Wars & Battles, Exploration & Discovery, Science & Technology, Art & Culture, Leaders & Legends, and more
• Learn as you play with instant answer explanations
• Perfect for quick sessions you can finish in minutes, with real learning that sticks.

Whether you’re interested in culture, philosophy, or historical networks, this app provides a gateway to understanding the past. Just for today, start your journey into history.

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Монголын Эмнести Интернэшнлийн гишүүн, дэмжигч болон хүний эрх хамгаалагчдад үйлсэд нэгдэх, хүний эрхийн мэдээ, мэдээлэл авах хүсэлтэй хүн бүрд зориулав. Тус аппликэйшнийг суулгаснаар та дараах мэдээллийг авах болно. Үүнд:

1. Хүний эрхийн төлөө захидал, уриалгад оролцох.
2. Дэлхийн болон Монгол улсын хүний эрхийн төлөв байдал.
3. Удахгүй болох хүний эрхийн үйл ажиллагаа.
4. Эмнести Интернэшнлийн үйл ажиллагаа.
5. Гишүүн, дэмжигч нарын хүний эрхийн үйл ажиллагаанд оролцох боломж.

This application is dedicated to members or activists of Amnesty International Mongolia who want to take action for human rights and receive human rights news. By downloading the application, you will get the following information:

1. To take action for human rights by signing petitions, letters and etc to the relevant authorities to ask them to take immediate actions to remedy those who are the victims of the human rights violation, stop human rights abuses, hold accountable those who are responsible for and so on.
2. To read and learn about general human rights, including human rights reports and reviews produced by Amnesty International and other human rights organizations in Mongolia.
3. To participate in upcoming human rights events and activities both online and offline.
4. To get information about how Amnesty International works.
5. To get information on joining Amnesty International Mongolia and contributing to bringing change in human rights.

app_name: Love Click Money to Clear Debt
description:
The mafia boss is after you — and he wants his $35,000 back! Step into the Game Arena and play your way to freedom by earning money through fun and fast-paced clicking challenges.
Test your speed, reflexes, and focus across three exciting mini-games:
 • Click to Earn – Tap Henry to make $1 per click and buy upgrades to boost your earning speed.
 • Mole Smash – Hit the moles for quick cash, but avoid the bombs that can wipe out your earnings!
 • Fruit Click – Tap fruits to earn money and unlock rare fruits that pay even more.
Collect $35,000, return to the mafia boss, and clear your debt once and for all!
Features:
 • Three addictive money-making mini-games
 • Easy tap controls for all ages
 • Upgrade and unlock new rewards
 • A fun storyline about paying off your debt to the mafia
Tap, earn, and win your freedom in Clicking Game to Clear Debt — the ultimate idle clicker challenge!

Inkitt Brings Stories to Life
